articles.description: Ukrainian champion Oleksandr Usyk knocks out Britain's Daniel Dubois in the ninth round to retain his WBA, WBO & IBF heavyweight world titles.
articles.title: Usyk knocks out Dubois to retain heavyweight titles

articles.description: Spain's Women's World Cup-winning head coach Jorge Vilda criticises football federation president Luis Rubiales' behaviour in kissing Jenni Hermoso for the first time.
articles.title: Spain boss Vilda criticises 'inappropriate' Rubiales

articles.description: Jos Buttler leads a superb Manchester Originals chase of 197 to beat Southern Brave in the men's Hundred eliminator.
articles.title: Brilliant Buttler leads Originals to Hundred final

articles.description: Fiji beat England for the first time in their history as both sides ended their World Cup preparations at Twickenham.
articles.title: Fiji beat England for first time in history

articles.description: Watch as Ben Pattison becomes the first British man to win a World Championship 800m medal since 1987.
articles.title: GB's Pattison wins brilliant 800m bronze

articles.description: Britain's Ben Pattison claims a shock 800m bronze medal with a sensational run on his World Championship debut in Budapest.
articles.title: Britain's Pattison claims shock 800m bronze

articles.description: British number seven Lily Miyazaki qualifies for the main draw of a major for the first time after winning in US Open qualifying, but Liam Broady is out.
articles.title: Britain's Miyazaki qualifies for first US Open

articles.description: Watch highlights as Great Britain's women win 4x100m relay bronze behind winners the United States at the World Athletics Championships.
articles.title: GB take sprint relay bronze as USA triumph

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Saturday's Premier League game between Brighton & Hove Albion and West Ham United.
articles.title: Brighton & Hove Albion v West Ham United team news

articles.description: Norway's Viktor Hovland leads by six shots heading into Sunday's final round of the PGA Tour's season-ending Tour Championship in Atlanta.
articles.title: Hovland takes control of Tour Championship
